summary: This is a simple mod. It is just a .txt file that you put in your Skyrim directory. Then simply start up the game, open up the console using the ~ key, and type, \"bat ancient\". This will give you a full set of Ancient Nord Armour.
descriptionHtml:
This is a simple mod. It is just a .txt file that you put in your Skyrim directory. Then simply start up the game, open up the console using the ~ key, and type, \"bat ancient\". This will give you a full set of Ancient Nord Armour.

If you don\'t know what ancient nord armor is, it is worn by Draugr, and a few NPCs, the only NPC I know of that wears it is Aela the Huntress, who can be found in the companions\' mead hall.

EDIT: Added screenshots by request.
author: Hellhammer33
